Logo Position.name: logo_position
Logo Position.help:
Sets the position of the forum logo.
Default value: 'middle'.

Header Background Repeat.name: header_repeat
Header Background Repeat.help:
Sets the repeat direction for the header background image.
Default value: 'no-repeat'.

Header Background Position.name: header_position
Header Background Position.help:
Sets position for header background.
Default value: 'middle top'.

Stretch header background to fill space?.name: header_size
Stretch header background to fill space?.help:
Stretches background image to fill header space. Only recommended for large backgrounds that don't repeat.
Note: Automatically applied when parallax header is enabled.
Default value: No.

Header Background Effect.name: header_effect
Header Background Effect.help:
Applies a visual style to the header bg image (if uploaded).
Default value: 'none'.

Parallax Header?.name: parallax_header
Parallax Header?.help:
Subtly moves the header background when scrolling.
Note: Requires a header image taller than the forum header. See documentation.
Default value: No.

Enable Animated Header Particles?.name: header_particles
Enable Animated Header Particles?.help:
Enables an animated geometric overlay across the header.
Default value: No.

Header Format.name: header_format
Header Format.help:
Text uses forum's sitename and description.
Default value: Both.

Navbar Position.name: navbar_position
Navbar Position.help:
Defines where the primary navigation is displayed.
Default value: 'Outside Header'.

Font.name: font_family
Font.help:
Set the font face. Previews can be found in description'
Default: Roboto.

Layout Type.name: layout_type
Layout Type.help:
Sets the width of your forum.
Fluid: Full width, resizes and scales with the browser.
Boxed: Fixed width, margins between content and browser edges.
Note: In boxed layout sidebars won't display on smaller devices
Default value: Fluid.

Theme Base Colour.name: base_colour
Theme Base Colour.help:
Choose a light or dark base colour. See documentation for previews.
Default value: 'Light'.

Theme Preset Colour.name: colour_preset
Theme Preset Colour.help:
Choose a predefined colour palette for your forum's accent colour. See documentation for previews.
Default value: 'No Preset'.

Theme Accent Colour.name: colour_picker
Theme Accent Colour.help:
Select colour of category headers, links and buttons.
Note: Only applied if 'No Preset' is selected above.

High Contrast Footer Links?.name: high_contrast_links
High Contrast Footer Links?.help:
Overrides custom colour above with white links. Enable if you've set a dark colour above.
Default Value: No

Forumlist Display.name: forumlist_display
Forumlist Display.help:
Defines how forums are displayed on the index page.
Default setting: List.

Content Block Headers.name: content_block_header
Content Block Headers.help:
Defines how category headers are displayed.
Default value: 'Block'.

Enable Sidebars?.name: sidebars
Enable Sidebars?.help:
Choose to enable or disable sidebars. Further options configured below.
Default Value: No

Sidebar Placement.name: sidebar_placement
Sidebar Placement.help:
Choose which sidebars to display.
Note: Left Sidebar will be hidden on handheld devices and small desktops.
Default value: 'Right only'.

Enable Sidebar Profile Widget?.name: profile_widget
Enable Sidebar Profile Widget?.help:
Displays User Avatar and basic profile links in right sidebar. Guests see a login/registration form,
Default Value: No

Enable Sidebar Search Widget?.name: search_widget
Enable Sidebar Search Widget?.help:
Displays a quick search form in the sidebar.
Default Value: No

Postprofile Side.name: postprofile_side
Postprofile Side.help:
Sets which side avatars / post counts display on when reading a topic.
Default setting: Right.

Enable Collapsible Panels?.name: collapsible_panels
Enable Collapsible Panels?.help:
Allows end-users to collapse/hide categories and sidebar blocks.
Default Value: No

Enable Scroll to Top button?.name: scroll_to_top
Enable Scroll to Top button?.help:
Adds a scroll to top shortcut on long pages.
Default Value: No

Hide Social Bar (footer)?.name: hide_social_bar
Hide Social Bar (footer)?.help:
Hides the social bar above the footer.
Default Value: No

Force Rounded 'Last Post' Avatars?.name: rounded_avatars
Force Rounded 'Last Post' Avatars?.help:
Forces the avatars within the 'last post' column to be round.
Requires Avatar in last post extension.
Default Value: No

Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.name: credit_line
Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.help: We'd rather you didn't, but it's OK if you really want to :)
